100001.name: Island Authority Permit
100001.description: A device that gives a friend permission to come and go to the island. The permit is valid forever once they've gone through the process!
100001.tip: You can now research Island Authority Permits.

100002.name: Unlock: Island Map
100002.description: Unlocks a map of the island. Makes exploring and getting around the island easier.
100002.tip: You can now view the map from the main menu.

100003.name: Unlock: Business Events
100003.description: Business events may now appear when managing shops. If you change your sales lineup to the items called for by the event, you may earn a large amount of rewards.
100003.tip: Business events may now appear when managing shops.

100004.name: Integrated Management Hub
100004.description: Unlocks the centralized management function, powered by holographic integration technology. This intelligent hub helps you coordinate job assignments, facility construction, and materials management with a single click, significantly improving the efficiency of your island planning.
100004.tip: Can be inspected through the management menu.

100301.name: Warehouse Capacity+ I
100301.description: Increases the warehouse's capacity. Now you can put more things there!
100301.tip: Can be inspected through the warehouse menu.

110001.name: Unlock: Urgent Requests
110001.description: Makes it possible for urgent requests to appear. Urgent requests often yield more rewards than regular ones do.

110002.name: Unlock: Request Rating
110002.description: Completing island requests can now increase your rating level.
110002.tip: Can be inspected through the requests menu.

140101.description: Add more slots for research at the base, doubling the efficiency.

210101.name: Unlock: Logging Slot
210101.description: Unlocks a logging slot in the Verdant Woods. Helps keep a steady flow of lumber going to the harbor.
210101.tip: You can assign characters at O'Brien's workspace.

210102.name: Logging Slot+ I
210102.description: Increases the number of logging slots in the Verdant Woods. A straightforward increase to your lumber production output.
210102.tip: You can now assign more characters to the logging site.

540101.description: Increases the number of staff slots at the Fin-'n'-Feather Grill. Increases your food production speed.
540101.tip: You can now assign more characters to the Fin-'n'-Feather Grill.

540201.name: Chicken and Potato Hors d'Oeuvre
540201.description: Allows for the production of simple and tasty Chicken and Potato Hors d'Oeuvres.
540201.tip: You can now obtain Chicken and Potato Hors d'Oeuvres.

540202.name: Stir-Fried Chicken
540202.description: Allows for the production of abundantly fragrant Stir-Fried Chicken.
540202.tip: You can now obtain Stir-Fried Chicken.

540204.name: Rolled Carrot Omelette
540204.description: Allows for the production of texture-rich Rolled Carrot Omelettes.
540204.tip: You can now obtain Rolled Carrot Omelettes.

540205.name: Steak Bowl
540205.description: Allows for the production of delicious and convenient Steak Bowls.
540205.tip: You can now obtain Steak Bowls.

550201.name: Cheese
550201.description: Allows for the production of protein-rich and fatty Cheese.

550202.name: Latte
550202.description: Allows for the production of aromatic and smooth Lattes.

550203.name: Citrus Coffee
550203.description: Allows for the production of fresh and uniquely flavored Citrus Coffee.
550203.tip: You can now obtain Citrus Coffees.

550204.name: Strawberry Milkshake
550204.description: Allows for the production of invigorating and mellow Strawberry Milkshakes.
550204.tip: You can now obtain Strawberry Milkshakes.

610101.name: Transport Job Limit+ I
610101.description: Increases the number of transport jobs that can be accepted. This will let you acquire resources from different places more easily.
610101.tip: Can be inspected through the transport job menu.

610102.name: Transport Job Limit+ II
610102.description: Increases the number of transport jobs that can be accepted. This will let you acquire resources from different places more easily.
610102.tip: Can be inspected through the transport job menu.

610401.name: Transport Efficiency+ I
610401.description: Shortens the transport time of transport jobs, making goods flow more efficiently.
610401.tip: Your efficiency with transport jobs has increased.

610402.name: Transport Efficiency+ II
610402.description: Shortens the transport time of transport jobs, making goods flow more efficiently.
610402.tip: Your efficiency with transport jobs has increased.

610403.name: Transport Efficiency+ III
610403.description: Shortens the transport time of transport jobs, making goods flow more efficiently.
610403.tip: Your efficiency with transport jobs has increased.

620101.name: Caf Manjuu Slot+
620101.description: Increases the number of staff slots at Caf Manjuu. Increases your food production speed.
620101.tip: You can now assign more characters to the orchard.

630101.name: Lumber Processing Slot+
630101.description: Increases the number of staff slots for lumber processing. Increases your production speed of wooden items.
630101.tip: You can now assign more characters to manufacture wooden items.

630201.name: Notebook
630201.description: Allows for the production of practical record-keeping Notebooks.

630202.name: Chair and Desk
630202.description: Allows for the production of a place to rest and work in the form of Chairs and Desks.
630202.tip: You can now obtain Chairs and Desks.

630203.name: Oak Barrel
630203.description: Allows for the production of tightly sealed Oak Barrels for preservation.
630203.tip: You can now obtain Choice Wooden Barrels.

630204.name: Filing Cabinet
630204.description: Allows for the production of metallic Filing Cabinets to store documents.
630204.tip: You can now obtain Filing Cabinets.

640001.name: Unlock: Manufactured Items
640001.description: Unlocks the production of manufactured items.
640001.tip: You have unlocked manufactured item production at the Base Factory.

640101.name: Industrial Production Slot+
640101.description: Increases the number of staff slots for industrial production. Increases your production speed of manufactured items.
640101.tip: You can now assign more characters to manufacture products.

640201.name: Nails
640201.description: Allows for the production of metallic Nails to keep things pinned down.

640202.name: Cable
640202.description: Allows for the production of insulated Cables for routing electricity and signals.

640203.name: Chemicals
640203.description: Allows for the production of Chemicals for industrial and scientific applications.

640204.name: Gunpowder
640204.description: Allows for the production of granular Gunpowder for explosive and propulsive applications.

640205.name: Utensils
640205.description: Allows for the production of metallic Utensils for eating with.

650001.name: Unlock: Electronic Items
650001.description: Unlocks the production of electronic items.
650001.tip: You have unlocked manufactured item production at the Base Factory.

650101.name: Electronics Production Slot+
650101.description: Increases the number of staff slots for electronics production. Increases your production speed of electronic items.
650101.tip: You can now assign more characters to manufacture electronics.

650201.name: Clock
650201.description: Allows for the production of Clocks to accurately tell the time.

650202.name: Battery
650202.description: Allows for the production of energy-storing Batteries.

650203.name: Water Filter
650203.description: Allows for the production of Water Filter cores that make water potable.
650203.tip: You can now obtain Water Filters.

660001.name: Unlock: Arts & Crafts Items
660001.description: Unlocks the production of arts & crafts items.

660101.name: Arts & Crafts Slot+
660101.description: Increases the number of staff slots for arts & crafts production. Increases your production speed of artisanal items.
660101.tip: You can now assign more characters to make arts & crafts.

660201.name: Leather

660204.tip: You can now obtain Aroma Sachets.

660205.name: Shoes
